text: Richard Colman OAM (born 28 November 1984) is a disabled athlete from Australia. He raced in the 2004 Summer Paralympics and he won a gold medal in the men's 800 metres--T53 race, and a silver medal in the men's 4 x 100 metre relay--T53-54 race. He raced at the 2008 Summer Paralympics and he won a silver medal in the men's 200 metres--T53 race, and a bronze medal in the men's 400 metres--T53 race. == References == Category:Australian athletes Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Australia Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Australia Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Australia Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics
title: Richard Colman
